column5: Leaving for Red Lake via Fort Francis and Drydon Thursday morning. Anything going on that we might want to know about and avoid? Thanks, Pooch
Pooch: Here's Ontario's road construction web site - see http://www.roadinfo.mto.gov.on.ca/en...ion/index.html
clear sailing..... watch out for moose saw lots jake

We quit taking 502 several years ago. We tak 71 to Vermillion Bay and stay there. Nice roads, a couple of towns. Takes the same time without the moose dangers( Still need to be careful, but not as many.105 is in great shape. It is about 36 miles longer, but still takes the same time.
